description: Suzhou; black leaf design on lid; round, flat and white
markings: on bottom, on sticker: [Andrew Kahane, Ltd/ Oriental Art/ New York/ 453]
medium: Tz'u-chou (Cizhou) ware Stoneware with painted black decor on white slip
text: This fine stoneware cosmetic box painted with an elegant, naturalistic (more often stylized) cross leaf pattern is a rare example of Cizhou ware. Cizhou wares are often distinguished by the liveliness of a brush-Â¬painted design in black slip onto a white slip ground, which represents the most successful use of brushwork on Chinese ceramics.
title: Cosmetic box
